original_title: UFO: The Greatest Story Ever Denied
overview: UFO - Greatest Story Ever Denied presents a provocative review of some of the most important UFO events since Roswell in 1946. Not only do we learn about such events as the Battle of LA and early military coverups, but interesting phenomena like RODs and invisible UFOs only detectable with infra red cameras.
tagline: Somewhere in the back of your mind, you've always known it was true.
title: UFO: The Greatest Story Ever Denied
